item.title: 【General Music Discussion】AAC or ALAC for Apple products
item.description: I have a large collection of audio files I am almost completely done re-acquiring in 16-Bit or higher FLAC. Since Apple products don’t support FLAC, I had been converting them to AAC. But I’m curious to get everyone’s opinion as to whether or not it’s worth converting to ALAC instead. I have a 1TB iPhone I put a lot of that music on, so, it’s not a storage issue.
item.author: LuisTX
